Millepied is best-known to tabloid gossip fans as the husband of actress Natalie Portman, whom he met while working as choreographer on the Oscar-winning film "Black Swan". 

But he was already a star in his own right -- a former principal dancer with the New…
Articles.Content: Paris (AFP) He conquered the New York stage, married a Hollywood star and directed a daring new film version of "Carmen". But Benjamin Millepied says he had to give up the American Dream to return to… [+2817 chars]
